## Load Libraries

```{r load.libraries}
library(coin)
library(dplyr)
library(dabestr)
```

## Load Data


```{r load.data}
attach(wellbeing_ind) # From dabestr package.


wide.wellbeing <- 
  tibble::tibble(
    control = wellbeing_ind$control, 
    test = wellbeing_ind$test)


tidy.wellbeing   <- 
  wide.wellbeing %>%
  tidyr::gather(key = Group, value = Measurement)

tidy.wellbeing[["Group"]] <- forcats::as_factor(tidy.wellbeing[["Group"]])

# 
# head(iris)
# 
# iris.two <- iris %>% filter(Species %in% c("versicolor", "virginica"))
```


## Run Tests

```{r run.tests}

# # Conventional t-test
# t.test(Sepal.Width ~ Species, data = iris.two)


# Permutation t-test
independence_test(Measurement ~ Group,
                  distribution = "asymptotic",
                  data = tidy.wellbeing)

```
